title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 250.1 - Violations of the Lobbying Act
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 250.1 - Violations of the Lobbying Act

State Regulations

The following acts by any lobbyist, public corporation or
client are violations of the Lobbying Act: (a) the knowing and willful failure to file a
complete and accurate statement of registration, bi-monthly or semi-annual
report, or any amendment thereto, within the time required; (b) the knowing and willful offering or
giving a gift with a value exceeding $75 to a public official; and
(c) the knowing and willful filing of a false
statement or report required to be filed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
250.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
